DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAGES = #{stages,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: ID, PINDEX, AUDIT_STATUS, REJECT_TYPE, REJECT_REASON, RELEASE_STATUS, HID, HOUSE_TYPE, CHECKIN_TIME, RENT_TYPE, LEASE_MODE, RENT, VILLAGE_NAME, DISTRICT, NO, FLOOR, BUILD_TIME, APARTMENT_LAYOUT, ORIENTATION, DECOR, DECOR_TIME, FACILITIES, ELECTRIC, FEATURE, ENVIRONMENT, REQUIREMENT, TITLE, TEL, CONTACT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, VERSION, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER, DELETE_FLG, LOCK_USERID, LOCK_TIME,DESCRIPTION,STAGES,OWNER_COST_ITEMS,OWNER_COST,PREFERENTIAL,ONLINE_PAYMENT, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = LEASE_MODE) RENTAL_MODE_NAME
mapper.select: select , ( SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rent_deposit' AND CODE = SUBSTRING_INDEX(rent_Type, ',', 1) ) pay1, ( SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rent_payment' AND CODE = SUBSTRING_INDEX(rent_Type, ',', - 1) ) pay2 from hou_lease_info where HID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DELETE_FLG = 0

select , (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT from hou_lease_info L where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM con_contract WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND STATUS in ('1','2','9','14') AND LESSEE_PID = #{0} AND HID = #{1}

SELECT A.ID, (SELECT USER_ID FROM AGT_EMP_INFO WHERE ID = A.EID) EID, A.BEID, A.NO, A.BASE_ID FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A ,HOU_LEASE_INFO B WHERE A.ID = B.HID AND B.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND A.ID = #{id} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT L.HID, L.ID, A.NO LNO, L.TITLE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = L.LEASE_MODE) LEASE_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_decor' AND CODE = L.DECOR) DECOR_NAME, L.DISTRICT, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1) DISTRICT_AREA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) DISTRICT_DIST, (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.FLOOR, L.RENT, L.SOURCE_TYPE, L.LEASE_MODE, L.DECOR, L.FEATURE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.MODIFY_TIME, L.CREATE_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION WHERE HID = A.ID ) COLLECTION_COUNT, A.CERT_STATUS, L.VILLAGE_NAME, L.DESCRIPTION, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_orientation' AND CODE = L.ORIENTATION) ORIENTATION, L.REQUIREMENT, L.OWNER_COST_ITEMS, A.EID, (SELECT COUNT(U.ID) FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION U WHERE U.HID = A.ID AND U.UID = #{eid}) IS_COLLECT, (SELECT COUNT(U.ID) FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION U WHERE U.HID = A.ID ) COLLECT_COUNT FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND A.EID = #{eid} and A.BASE_ID = #{baseId}

SELECT L.HID, L.ID, A.NO LNO,
(CASE WHEN (L.TITLE IS NULL OR L.TITLE = '') THEN ( CONCAT(l.DISTRICT_NAME,' ', (case when (l.VILLAGE_NAME is null or l.VILLAGE_NAME = '') THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(l.VILLAGE_NAME,' ') END), SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) ,'室', SUBSTRING(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,3,1) ,'厅', SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', -1) ,'卫 ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.BUILDING_AREA,'.', 1) ,'平 ', (CASE l.LEASE_MODE WHEN '1' THEN '整租' ELSE '合租' END) ) ) ELSE L.TITLE END) TITLE,
(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = L.LEASE_MODE) LEASE_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_decor' AND CODE = L.DECOR) DECOR_NAME, L.DISTRICT, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1) DISTRICT_AREA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) DISTRICT_DIST, (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.FLOOR, L.RENT, L.SOURCE_TYPE, L.LEASE_MODE, L.DECOR, L.FEATURE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.MODIFY_TIME, L.CREATE_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION WHERE HID = A.ID ) COLLECTION_COUNT, A.CERT_STATUS, L.VILLAGE_NAME FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.RELEASE_STATUS = 1 AND L.AUDIT_STATUS != 2 AND A.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND A.LOCK_STATUS = 0 AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 1 AND L.DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,4
SELECT count(1) FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L,USR_HOU_COLLECTION C WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.ID = C.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND C.UID = #{eid}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT L.HID, L.ID, A.NO LNO,
(CASE WHEN (L.TITLE IS NULL OR L.TITLE = '') THEN ( CONCAT(l.DISTRICT_NAME,' ', (case when (l.VILLAGE_NAME is null or l.VILLAGE_NAME = '') THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(l.VILLAGE_NAME,' ') END), SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) ,'室', SUBSTRING(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,3,1) ,'厅', SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', -1) ,'卫 ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.BUILDING_AREA,'.', 1) ,'平 ', (CASE l.LEASE_MODE WHEN '1' THEN '整租' ELSE '合租' END) ) ) ELSE L.TITLE END) TITLE,
(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = L.LEASE_MODE) LEASE_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_decor' AND CODE = L.DECOR) DECOR_NAME, L.DISTRICT, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1) DISTRICT_AREA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) DISTRICT_DIST, (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.FLOOR, L.RENT, L.SOURCE_TYPE, L.LEASE_MODE, L.DECOR, L.FEATURE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.MODIFY_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION WHERE HID = A.ID ) COLLECT_COUNT, A.CERT_STATUS, L.VILLAGE_NAME, (SELECT C.ID FROM CMS_AD_HOUSE C WHERE C.HOUSE_ID = A.ID AND C.DELETE_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1) COLLECTFLG, C.CTIME CREATE_TIME, L.RELEASE_TIME, L.RELEASE_STATUS FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L,USR_HOU_COLLECTION C WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.ID = C.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND C.UID = #{eid} ) A
ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT A.*, B.building_area buildingArea, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.district,',', -1)) area FROM HOU_LEASE_INFO A left join HOU_HOUSE_INFO B on A.hid = B.id WHERE A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND A.ID = #{id}

SELECT CONCAT((SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = (SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{district},',', 1) )) ,' ', (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{district},',', -1) )) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
update hou_lease_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PINDEX = #{record.pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LNO = #{record.lno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{record.auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_TYPE = #{record.rejectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_REASON = #{record.rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASE_STATUS = #{record.releaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TO_SPECIAL = #{record.toSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHELF_TYPE = #{record.shelfType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHELF_REASON = #{record.shelfReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HID = #{record.hid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_TYPE = #{record.houseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATIONID = #{record.stationid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKIN_TIME = #{record.checkinTime,jdbcType=DATE},
RENT_TYPE = #{record.rentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEASE_MODE = #{record.leaseMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RENT = #{record.rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VILLAGE_NAME = #{record.villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{record.district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_NAME = #{record.districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NO = #{record.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOOR = #{record.floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_TIME = #{record.buildTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APARTMENT_LAYOUT = #{record.apartmentLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIENTATION = #{record.orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECOR = #{record.decor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECOR_TIME = #{record.decorTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACILITIES = #{record.facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELECTRIC = #{record.electric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEATURE = #{record.feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENVIRONMENT = #{record.environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIREMENT = #{record.requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{record.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRESH_TIME = #{record.freshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLG = #{record.deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LOCK_USERID = #{record.lockUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCK_TIME = #{record.lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RELEASE_TIME = #{record.releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOURCE_TYPE = #{record.sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OWNER_COST_ITEMS = #{record.ownerCostItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_COST = #{record.ownerCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( SELECT A.BEID EID, L.HID, L.ID, A.NO LNO,
(CASE WHEN (L.TITLE IS NULL OR L.TITLE = '') THEN ( CONCAT(l.DISTRICT_NAME,' ', (case when (l.VILLAGE_NAME is null or l.VILLAGE_NAME = '') THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(l.VILLAGE_NAME,' ') END), SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) ,'室', SUBSTRING(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,3,1) ,'厅', SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', -1) ,'卫 ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.BUILDING_AREA,'.', 1) ,'平 ', (CASE l.LEASE_MODE WHEN '1' THEN '整租' ELSE '合租' END) ) ) ELSE L.TITLE END) TITLE,
(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = L.LEASE_MODE) LEASE_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_decor' AND CODE = L.DECOR) DECOR_NAME, L.DISTRICT, L.DISTRICT_NAME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1) DISTRICT_AREA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) DISTRICT_DIST, (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.FLOOR, L.RENT, L.SOURCE_TYPE, L.LEASE_MODE, L.DECOR, L.FEATURE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.MODIFY_TIME, L.CREATE_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION WHERE HID = A.ID ) COLLECT_COUNT, A.CERT_STATUS, L.VILLAGE_NAME, (SELECT C.ID FROM CMS_AD_HOUSE C WHERE C.HOUSE_ID = A.ID AND C.DELETE_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1) COLLECTFLG, L.ELECTRIC, L.STATIONID, A.HOUSE_ADDR FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.RELEASE_STATUS = 1 AND L.AUDIT_STATUS = 1 AND A.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND A.LOCK_STATUS = 0 AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 1 AND L.DELETE_FLG = 0 ) A
AND ( VILLAGE_NAME LIKE '%${inputValue}%' OR HOUSE_ADDR LIKE '%${inputValue}%' OR DISTRICT_NAME LIKE '%${inputValue}%' )
AND EID = #{eid}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.BEID EID, L.HID, L.ID, A.NO LNO,
(CASE WHEN (L.TITLE IS NULL OR L.TITLE = '') THEN ( CONCAT(l.DISTRICT_NAME,' ', (case when (l.VILLAGE_NAME is null or l.VILLAGE_NAME = '') THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(l.VILLAGE_NAME,' ') END), SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) ,'室', SUBSTRING(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,3,1) ,'厅', SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', -1) ,'卫 ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.BUILDING_AREA,'.', 1) ,'平 ', (CASE l.LEASE_MODE WHEN '1' THEN '整租' ELSE '合租' END) ) ) ELSE L.TITLE END) TITLE,
(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = L.LEASE_MODE) LEASE_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'hou_decor' AND CODE = L.DECOR) DECOR_NAME, L.DISTRICT, L.DISTRICT_NAME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1) DISTRICT_AREA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) DISTRICT_DIST, (SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', 1)) DISTRICT_AREA_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.DISTRICT,',', -1) ) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.FLOOR, L.RENT, L.SOURCE_TYPE, L.LEASE_MODE, L.DECOR, L.FEATURE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT,',', 1) APARMENT_ROOM, L.MODIFY_TIME, L.CREATE_TIME, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM USR_HOU_COLLECTION WHERE HID = A.ID ) COLLECT_COUNT, A.CERT_STATUS, L.VILLAGE_NAME, (SELECT C.ID FROM CMS_AD_HOUSE C WHERE C.HOUSE_ID = A.ID AND C.DELETE_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1) COLLECTFLG, L.ELECTRIC, L.STATIONID, A.HOUSE_ADDR FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO A,HOU_LEASE_INFO L WHERE A.ID = L.HID AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.RELEASE_STATUS = 1 AND L.AUDIT_STATUS = 1 AND A.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND A.LOCK_STATUS = 0 AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 1 AND L.DELETE_FLG = 0 ) A
AND ( VILLAGE_NAME LIKE '%${inputValue}%' OR HOUSE_ADDR LIKE '%${inputValue}%' OR DISTRICT_NAME LIKE '%${inputValue}%' )
AND EID = #{eid}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
